component.name: pv (Pipe Viewer)
component.summary: Rust reimplementation of the pipe viewer utility

description.p: A modern Rust reimplementation of the classic Unix pv (pipe viewer) utility. This tool monitors the progress of data through a Unix pipeline, showing data transfer rate, amount transferred, time elapsed, and estimated completion time.

ul.li: Custom format strings for flexible output display
Numeric output mode for scripting integration
Line counting mode for text processing
Comprehensive CLI compatibility with standard pv

description.p: Enhanced feature release with custom format strings and numeric output support.
